title: Getting Started with Next.js
content: Learn how to set up a new Next.js project and create your first pages.

title: Responsive Design Techniques
content: Explore various techniques to make your web designs responsive on different devices.

title: Introduction to Tailwind CSS
content: Discover the key features of Tailwind CSS and how to use utility classes effectively.

title: JavaScript Fundamentals
content: Learn the basics of JavaScript programming, including variables, functions, and control structures.

title: Working with APIs in React
content: Explore how to fetch and display data from APIs in your React applications.

title: Node.js and Express for Backend Development
content: Get started with building server-side applications using Node.js and Express framework.
